title: Scotch & Soda Homepage
description: I built a responsive homepage for Scotch-Soda using a 12 column grid system.

title: SCS - Midnight Madness
description: 24 hour promotional sale for SCS (Sofa Carpet Specialists - UK). They received 4 times the amount of orders within 24 hours.

title: Kleenbeats - One page wordpress website
description: A one page website for an Australian music production company.

title: Lekkertickets - ADE tickets online shop
description: I built a shopify cart for Amsterdam Dance Event (ADE) Tickets. This was a personal project, and I built myself this end to end. Made about EUR 1500 worth of sales in 1 week.

title: Funda Mobiel
description: I worked as part of the mobile team at Funda, and made some improvements to the mobile website

title: Wordpress Website for Cloud 55
description: A responsive wordpress website for Cloud55 for a boutique IT consulting company in Sydney, Australia

title: Ninemsn News - Leading News Portal in Australia
description: I worked as part of the agile IT team at Ninemsn, and helped them build a brand new Sitecore website. This was the leading News portal in Australia, with 6 million hits on the 1st day of launch, and were handled successfully without issues. All development was 100% test-driven, and we used pair-programming techniques. Fun project.

title: Mitre 10
description: We built an online competition for Mitre10 Australia to drive traffic to their website.

title: eCoffeeCard - Mobile app in Australia
description: Australia has a strong cafe culture, with 1000's of small cafes feeding the country's 20 million people with their daily caffeine needs. I built a blackberry app for eCoffeeCard using phonegap, so it was primarily built using javascript/CSS/Html

title: Grid Generator
description: Random grid generator using javascript. Because why not!

title: Top Makelaars
description: App that shows top makelaars in Amstelveen. Because why not!

title: Distance Calculator
description: Web app to show distance and route to anywhere. Because why not!
